医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
肠道细菌疣状瘤胃球菌可以增强癌症免疫治疗的效果大约五分之一的癌症患者受益于免疫疗法——一种利用免疫系统对抗癌症的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Gut-bacteria-Ruminococcus-gnavus-can-enhance-the-effects-of-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Gut-bacteria-Ruminococcus-gnavus-can-enhance-the-effects-of-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=231d41b3-ddc8-45e3-a827-4d6f7e616c68 Fri, 17 May 2024 14:53:00 -0400 Gut bacteria Ruminococcus gnavus can enhance the effects of cancer immunotherapy
持续长期生酮饮食可能诱发多器官细胞衰老用于减肥和糖尿病的严格“酮友好”饮食，取决于饮食和个人，可能并不那么友好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Continously-long-term-ketogenic-diet-may-induce-cellular-senthesis-in-multiple-organs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Continously-long-term-ketogenic-diet-may-induce-cellular-senthesis-in-multiple-organs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd03e7e4-ebb9-4a41-b932-419b52afe31f Fri, 17 May 2024 14:44:00 -0400 Continuous long-term ketogenic diet may induce cellular senescence in multiple organs
研究发现免疫检查点蛋白 VISTA 可在免疫治疗过程中直接关闭 T 细胞克利夫兰诊所领导的科学家和医生团队发现，免疫检查点蛋白VISTA可以在免疫治疗过程中直接关闭抗肿瘤T细胞，从而抵抗治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Immune-checkpoint- Protein-VISTA-can-directly-turn-off-T-cells-during-immunotherapy-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Immune-checkpoint- Protein-VISTA-can-directly-turn-off-T-cells-during-immunotherapy-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0536c2b3-921f-4cf8-8430-252a77e134e5 Fri, 17 May 2024 14:23:00 -0400 Immune checkpoint protein VISTA can directly turn off T-cells during immunotherapy, study finds
AMR 多利益相关方合作平台制定了针对抗菌素耐药性行动的关键建议抗菌素耐药性（AMR）是全球最大的公共卫生和发展威胁之一。据世界卫生组织 (WHO) 统计，2019 年估计有 495 万人死亡与 AMR 相关，其中 127 万人死于细菌 AMR。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/AMR-Multi-Stakeholder-Partnership-Platform-develops-key-recommendations-for-action-on-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/AMR-Multi-Stakeholder-Partnership-Platform-develops-key-recommendations-for-action-on-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=baec7d15-ef9c-4962-b944-dbf3e9349c17 Fri, 17 May 2024 14:15:00 -0400 AMR Multi-Stakeholder Partnership Platform develops key recommendations for action on antimicrobial resistance
研究人员追踪木质素合成中关键植物蛋白的进化美国能源部 (DOE) 布鲁克海文国家实验室的科学家发现，一种负责合成关键植物材料的蛋白质的进化比人们想象的要早得多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Researchers-trace-the-evolution-of-key-plant- Protein-in-lignin-synthesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Researchers-trace-the-evolution-of-key-plant- Protein-in-lignin-synthesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50a5f00c-fe1f-4b5a-bda1-f1f141cd461e Fri, 17 May 2024 14:06:00 -0400 Researchers trace the evolution of key plant protein in lignin synthesis
了解高脂肪饮食、胰岛素抵抗和糖尿病心脏病之间的联系高脂肪饮食与 2 型糖尿病和心脏病风险增加之间的关系是众所周知的。但其中的联系是什么以及它是如何运作的呢？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Understanding-the-link- Between-high-fat-diets-insulin-resistance-and-diabetic-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Understanding-the-link- Between-high-fat-diets-insulin-resistance-and-diabetic-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=402e6b2a-a490-4218-96da-20781e5c2c0b Fri, 17 May 2024 13:46:00 -0400 Understanding the link between high-fat diets, insulin resistance, and diabetic heart disease
研究揭示重复接种 COVID-19 疫苗的积极影响医护人员于 2020 年 12 月接种了第一剂 COVID-19 疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-reveals-positive-impact-of-repeat-COVID-19-vaccinations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-reveals-positive-impact-of-repeat-COVID-19-vaccinations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54c10226-0cdf-47aa-8bd2-90d449ad121f Fri, 17 May 2024 13:34:00 -0400 Study reveals positive impact of repeat COVID-19 vaccinations
播客：新的在线工具帮助年轻人更好地管理克罗恩病阿斯顿大学的 Cassie Screti 博士加入了为世界炎症性肠病日录制的最新 Aston Originals Health Matters 播客，讨论了一种新的在线工具，可帮助年轻人更好地管理克罗恩病（一种炎症性肠病 (IBD)）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Podcast-New-online-tool-helps-young-people-better-manage-Crohns-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Podcast-New-online-tool-helps-young-people-better-manage-Crohns-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22092462-c011-481a-b10f-1885523984aa Fri, 17 May 2024 13:27:00 -0400 Podcast: New online tool helps young people better manage Crohn's disease
丹麦研究：空气污染与痴呆风险增加有关这是丹麦第一项显示空气污染与痴呆症之间联系的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Denmark-study-Air-pollution-tied-to-increased-risk-of-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Denmark-study-Air-pollution-tied-to-increased-risk-of-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65bf7680-6d5c-437a-b9a3-4f7ade389498 Fri, 17 May 2024 13:15:00 -0400 Denmark study: Air pollution tied to increased risk of dementia
罗格斯大学的研究人员揭露了战争对乌克兰医院造成的损失罗格斯大学的研究人员在国际合作者的帮助下追踪了战争对乌克兰医院系统造成的破坏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Rutgers-researchers-expose-wars-toll-on-Ukraines-hospitals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Rutgers-researchers-expose-wars-toll-on-Ukraines-hospitals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5273bb3-1f2c-4a4b-aae2-35930f3045a1 Fri, 17 May 2024 13:07:00 -0400 Rutgers researchers expose war's toll on Ukraine's hospitals
